scripts.dev:megameal: cd MEGAMEAL && pnpm install --ignore-workspace && pnpm dev
scripts.build:all: pnpm -r build && cd MEGAMEAL && pnpm install --ignore-workspace && pnpm build
scripts.build:megameal: cd MEGAMEAL && pnpm install --ignore-workspace && pnpm build
scripts.deploy:megameal: pnpm build:megameal && find MEGAMEAL/dist -size +25M -delete && pnpm dlx wrangler pages deploy MEGAMEAL/dist --project-name merkin-megameal
scripts.deploy:dndiy: pnpm build:dndiy && find DNDIY.github.io/dist -size +25M -delete && pnpm dlx wrangler pages deploy DNDIY.github.io/dist --project-name merkin-dndiy
scripts.deploy:temporal: pnpm build:temporal && pnpm dlx wrangler pages deploy Temporal-Flow/dist --project-name merkin-temporal
scripts.deploy:travel: pnpm build:travel && pnpm dlx wrangler pages deploy apps/travel/dist --project-name merkin-travel
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm deploy:megameal && pnpm deploy:dndiy && pnpm deploy:temporal && pnpm deploy:travel
